name: Toss Together
description:
Made for United Game Jam 2020. The time limit was 2 days but I only had one day to make it, so I submitted it early.  Toss Together is a very short puzzle game (proof of concept?) that involves tossing, together. Can be played in browser or standalone executable.

The theme of the jam was "Two", and so my interpretation was a game that has-- spoiler --two players.
